metadata.title: CVE-2022-22760 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When importing resources using Web Workers, error messages woulddistinguish the difference between application/javascriptresponses and non-script responses. This could have been abused to learninformation cross-origin. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 97,Thunderbird < 91.6, and Firefox ESR < 91.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
